Proc.src: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION normalize_utf8(texto character varying) RETURNS character varying AS $$select to_ascii(convert_to($1, 'latin1'), 'latin1')$$ LANGUAGE sql IMMUTABLE STRICT COST 100;
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION to_ascii(bytea, name) RETURNS text AS $$to_ascii_encname$$ LANGUAGE internal VOLATILE STRICT COST 1;

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION unaccented(text) RETURNS text AS $$ SELECT translate($1,'ÀÁÂÃÄÅĀĂĄÈÉÊËĒĔĖĘĚÌÍÎÏĨĪĮİÒÓÔÕÖØŌŎŐÙÚÛÜŨŪŬŮŰŲàáâãäåāăąèéêëēĕėęěìíîïĩīĭįòóôõöøōŏőùúûüũūŭůųÇçÑñÝýÿĆćĈĉĊċČčĎďĐđĜĝĞğĠġĢģĤĥĦħ', 'AAAAAAAAAEEEEEEEEEIIIIIIIIOOOOOOOOOUUUUUUUUUUaaaaaaaaaeeeeeeeeeiiiiiiiiooooooooouuuuuuuuuCcNnYyyCcCcCcCcDdDdGgGgGgGgHhHh'); $$ LANGUAGE sql IMMUTABLE STRICT COST 100;

View.Sql: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.created, p.appaccount_id, p.address, p.addressdetails, p.addressnumber, p.city_id, p.mobilephone, p.phone, p.postalcode, p.website, p.email, p.gender, p.birthdate, p.city_region_id, e.busunit_id, e.registration_number, e.job_function_id FROM person p JOIN employee e ON p.id = e.id

SELECT p.*, ph.religion, ph.professional_occupation, ph.professional_experience, live_with_family, home_situation, home_since, born_city_id, born_state_id, home_area, home_type, home_pieces_number, rent_value, first_help_date FROM person p INNER JOIN person_helped ph on p.id = ph.id

SELECT prj.name as project_name, php.*, p.name as person_name FROM project prj LEFT OUTER JOIN person_helped_project php ON prj.id = php.project_id LEFT OUTER JOIN person p ON php.person_id = p.id ORDER BY prj.name ASC, p.name ASC

Select ph.id as person_id, pfs.id as pfs_id, pfs.nome as pfs_nome, pfs.sigla as pgs_sigla FROM person_helped ph INNER JOIN person_programa_federal_social ppfs ON ph.id = ppfs.person_id INNER JOIN programa_federal_social pfs ON ppfs.pfs_id = pfs.id

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.created, p.appaccount_id, p.address, p.addressdetails, p.addressnumber, p.city_id, p.mobilephone, p.phone, p.postalcode, p.website, p.email, p.gender, p.birthdate, p.city_region_id FROM person p JOIN volunteer v ON p.id = v.id
